name: Tartan Full Circle Suspender Skirt
description:
This gorgeous suspender skirt is a quirky one shoulder design. Made from beautiful red tartan suiting fabric this is your perfect winter skirt! The skirt is a full circle shape and is high waisted going into to the shoulder strap. The zip fastening is in the side so the skirt can be worn either way around.

This item is MADE TO ORDER. Please allow up to 2 weeks for your order to be completed.

Available in the following sizes:

UK 8/US 4 = Waist: 26"/66cm Hip: 35"/90cm

UK 10/US 6 = Waist: 28"/70cm Hip: 37"/94cm

UK 12/US 8 = Waist: 29"/74cm Hip:38"/98cm

UK 14/US 10 = Waist: 30"/78cm Hip: 40"/102cm

UK 16/US 12 = Waist: 32"/82cm Hip: 41"/106cm

Skirt length is 19"/ 48cm measured from the top of waistband.

GARMENT CARE:
* Please treat me with care!
* Wash at 30 degrees
* Cool iron

name: Red Tartan Crop Top with Tattoo Back
description:
This top is MADE TO ORDER. Please allow at 1-2 weeks for your order to be completed.

This adorable little crop top is very on trend for this season and looks fantastic with high waisted jeans!
Made from gorgeous red tartan cotton with contrasting blacking binding and cute black heart buttons down the front. The top also has a very striking tattoo style heart appliqué on the back. The appliqué is made up of a heart, roses and a banner with 'True Love' and is embroidered by hand.
The top just pulls on and is elasticated at the bottom.

Fabric is 50% cotton, 50% polyester. 

Available in the following sizes:

SMALL: Bust 31"-33" (UK 6-8/ US 2-4)
MEDIUM: Bust 34"-36" (UK 10-12/ US 6-8)
LARGE: Bust 38"-40" (UK 14-16/ US 10-12)

Top is 17"/43cm in length.

GARMENT CARE:
* Please treat me with care!
* Wash at 30 degrees
*Do NOT tumble dry
* Medium heat iron

name: Red Tartan Skater Dress
description:
This item is currently MADE TO ORDER. Please allow 1 - 2 weeks for your order to be completed.

Gorgeous new party dress for 2013! This dress is on trend whilst staying very retro. It would make a great Christmas party dress.
Made from beautiful red tartan with a sweetheart shape necklace and full circle skirt. It has a high back with a zip fastening, contrasting binding and a little bow at the front. Dress is fully lined.

Available in the following sizes:

UK 8/US 4 = Bust: 33"/84cm Waist: 26"/66cm Hip: 35"/90cm

UK 10/US 6 = Bust: 34"/88cm Waist: 28"/70cm Hip: 37"/94cm

UK 16/US 12 = Bust: 40"/100cm Waist: 32.5"/82cm Hip:42"/106cm

Fabric composition: 50% cotton, 50% polyester.

name: Wet Look Tartan Skater Dress
description:
This item is currently MADE TO ORDER. Please allow 1 - 2 weeks for your order to be completed.

Gorgeous new party dress for 2013! This dress is very on trend whilst staying very retro. It would make a great Christmas party dress.
Made from beautiful black acetate satin which has a slight wet look to it and makes a wonderful swishing sound! The front panel is red tartan and is a sweetheart shape necklace. It has a high back with a zip fastening. The skirt is a full circle and looks great with a petticoat underneath.

Available in the following sizes:

UK 8/US 4 = Bust: 33"/84cm Waist: 26"/66cm Hip: 35"/90cm

UK 10/US 6 = Bust: 34"/88cm Waist: 28"/70cm Hip: 37"/94cm

UK 12/US 8 = Bust:36"/93cm Waist: 29"/74cm Hip:39"/98cm

UK 14/US 10 = Bust: 38"/96cm Waist: 31"/78cm Hip: 41"/102cm

UK 16/US 12 = Bust: 40"/100cm Waist: 32.5"/82cm Hip:42"/106cm

Dress length is: 30"/77cm (approx)

* Please treat me with care!
* COLD WASH ONLY
* Cool iron.

name: Satin Bomber Jacket with Tattoo Back
description:
This jacket is MADE TO ORDER. Please allow 2 weeks for your order to be completed.

This bomber style jacket is made from black stretch satin with rib trim cuffs and bottom edge. The jacket has a striking tattoo style appliqué on the back of a heart, roses and a banner that reads 'True Love'. The appliqué has been embroidered by hand.
The jacket is fully lined in red tartan fabric.
The jacket is a short length, finishing around the tops of the hips, with 3/4 length sleeves. Has a zip fastening in the front.
Fabric composition: 97% Acetate, 3% Lycra.

Available in the following sizes:

SMALL: Bust 31"-33" (UK 6-8/ US 2-4)
MEDIUM: Bust 34"-36" (UK 10-12/ US 6-8)
LARGE: Bust 38"-40" (UK 14-16/ US 10-12)

If you have any questions about measurements please get in touch & I'll be happy to help.

GARMENT CARE:
* Please treat me with care!
* COLD HAND WASH ONLY. DO NOT PUT IN THE WASHING MACHINE!!!
*Do NOT tumble dry
* Cool heat iron

Model is 5ft 3" and wears a size SMALL.
Model: Ebony Ivy
Photographer: Brian Harris
